name: Marco Aurélio Gerosa
content: Marco Aurelio Gerosa - Northern Arizona University (NAU) & University of São Paulo (USP) Marco Aurélio Gerosa Northern Arizona University (NAU) Menu About Career CV Projects Publications Funding Awards Advising Teaching Service Contact Marco.Gerosa@nau.edu Welcome to My Website! I am a Professor at the Northern Arizona University (NAU) and a member of the Computer Science Graduate Program at the University of São Paulo (USP), Brazil. A more formal bio can be found on the career page. I research the development of artificial intelligence applications. Some research interests: AI applications Human Aspects of Software Engineering Open source software Mining Software Repositories Bots and chatbots Computer Science Education Computer Supported Cooperative Work (CSCW) Marco Aurélio Gerosa Professor of Computer Science School of Informatics, Computing, and Cyber Systems (SICCS) Northern Arizona University (NAU) Email: Marco.Gerosa@nau.edu Office: 207, bld #90 PO Box 5693 ZIP 86011
